data.rail: Common Bends with rail moved out a further 3 yards from the hurdle racing line from the last meeting. Hurdles moved out by 4 yards to be against the inside line of the chase course on fresher ground. Chase fences narrowed down from the inside. Fence 5 (first in back straight) omitted in both chases. New Race distances come in to effect - with Hurdle course dolled out this adds 84 yards per circuit. Chase course on its inner line.

data.weather: Last week was generally warm, dry and breezy, cooler towards the end of the week. Saturday - overcast and drizzle in the morning, which put down 1mm, followed by a warm and bright evening, breezy. Sunday - dry, overcast and strong wind. Dry overnight into Monday. Overcast and breezy on Monday AM. Sharp shower at 1.30pm that put down 2mm. A further rain shower is expected at about 4pm, then dry during racing.
